name: Operator (itch) (Jasmine Persephone)
description:
A journalist must use her police scanner to keep her sister out of harms way while an intense protest becomes increasingly unsafe. In this thrilling interactive audio-drama, the player will use a radio the pinpoint the location of police in order to help their sister stay away from danger.

Credits
Game Design: Cloud Tian & Jasmine Persephone Jupiter
Engineering & Lead Audio Design: Cloud Tian (itch page: https://drctos.itch.io/)
Writing & Art: Jasmine Persephone Jupiter
Composing: Rena Farkas (email: Joyful247365@gmail.com)
Audio Engineering: El Wynne
